Detailed Description

Author: Jaakko Luttinen BodyMovable is class for moving bodies. Body has a velocity and if it has mass it will be affected by gravitational field. Body may also be set to destroy on collision.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

float  x,
float  y,
float  radius,
float  mass,
bool  emitGrav,
bool  collidable,
bool  destroyOnCollision
) 
 

Constructs a new body.

Parameters:
world The world which the body will be put into. Note, constructor does NOT add the body into the world automatically.
x X-coordinate of the body's center in the world.
y Y-coordinate of the body's center in the world.
radius The radius of the body.
mass The mass of the body.
emitGravitation Tells whether body emits gravitational field.
collidable Tells whether body is collidable.
destroyOnCollision Tells whether body should destroy on collision.
